mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from member where meminmail=#{meminmail}
mapper.update: update member set memaddr=#{memaddr}, mempwd=#{mempwd},memprofile=#{memprofile},meminmail=#{meminmail} where memnum=#{memnum}
update member set memaddr=#{memaddr}, mempwd=#{mempwd},memprofile=#{memprofile} where memnum=#{memnum}
